DOC.brief_title: One-Tooth One-Time ( 1T1T ) A Straightforward Approach Replace Missing Teeth Posterior Region : Case Series
DOC.criteria: 0 In good systemic health ( ASA I/ II ) Present contra indication oral surgical intervention The tooth implant site ( ) must extract lose least 12 week date implantation . At least 8 mm bone vertical dimension At least 6 mm bone buccolingual dimension . No need bone augmentation procedure dimension Full mouth plaque score ( FMPI ) low equal 25 % Exclusion Criteria Autoimmune disease require medical treatment Medical condition require prolong use steroid Use Bisphosphonate intravenously ˃ 3 year oral use Infection ( local systemic ) patient gingivitis active local infection undergo medical treatment prior entrance study , individual evaluate prior study procedure suitability , case systemic infection evaluation base medical anamnesis , necessary refer relevant medical test .
